Nkhensani Manganyi (nke a makwaara dị ka Nkhensani Nkosi) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ejiji na mba South Africa.

N'afọ 2000, Manganyi malitere ụlọ ejiji Stoned Cherrie. Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ hiwere nhiwe nwere  ọkwa dị elu na South Africa maka iji ihe oyiyi nke ndị dike oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ dị ka ihe na-apụta ugboro ugboro na atụmatụ ya nke T-shirts na elu efe cutaway. Otu n'ime ụdị elu efe nwoke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ a maara nke ọma gosipụtara mkpuchi sitere na magazin Drum na ihu onye na-emegide agwa ịkpa ókè agbụrụ bụStephen Biko, nke ndị ọrụ nchekwa steeti gburu na 1977, onye ihu ya ka bụ ihe nnọchianya ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị ike nke mmegide ịkpa oke agbụrụ.

Ọrụ ya gụnyekwara ihe eji eme anya na ihe eji eme ihe. Ọ gaala gburugburu mba Afrịka dị ka ọnụ na-ekwuchitere ọdịiche dị n'ụdị ejiji Afrịka. Ihe oyiyi nke Manganyi, dị ka Nkhensani Nkosi, na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ya na Johannesburg gụnyere n'akwụkwọ ahụ, "Asụsụ nke Fashion Design" dị ka ihe atụ nke otu ndị na-emepụta ihe si emepụta nchịkọta ha. E gosipụtara ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ Nkosi na Fashion Institute of Technology dị ka akụkụ nke ngosi Black Fashion Designers site na ọnwa Disemba afọ 2016 ruo Mee afọ 2017
Ihe nkiri Manganyi gụnyere Legend of the Hidden City, Tarzan: The Epic Adventures na Kickboxer 5.
N'afọ 2003, Manganyi bụ onye ọka ikpe na South African run nke usoro telivishọn Popstars
O kwuru n'oge ahụ, sị: "N'oge gara aga, nkatọ nke (Pop Stars) nwere mmetụta siri ike nke America nwere ike ịdị mkpa, mana echere m na usoro ọhụrụ anyị enyerela aka ịgbanwe nke ahụ
